movie.title: In Danger and Dire Distress the Middle of the Road Leads to Death
movie.title_english: In Danger and Dire Distress the Middle of the Road Leads to Death
movie.title_long: In Danger and Dire Distress the Middle of the Road Leads to Death (1974)
movie.description_intro: Two women with different goals in life are independently out on the town of Frankfurt am Main. One is an offbeat thief and the other an East German spy.
movie.description_full: Two women with different goals in life are independently out on the town of Frankfurt am Main. One is an offbeat thief and the other an East German spy.

movies.title: Hobo with a Shotgun
movies.summary: A vigilante homeless man pulls into a new city and finds himself trapped in urban chaos, a city where crime rules and where the city's crime boss reigns. Seeing an urban landscape filled with armed robbers, corrupt cops, abused prostitutes, and even a pedophile Santa, the Hobo (Rutger Hauer) goes about bringing justice to the city the best way he knows how - with a 20-gauge shotgun. Mayhem ensues when he tries to make things better for the future generation. Street justice will indeed prevail.

Mayhem ensues when he tries to make things better for the future generation. Street justice will indeed prevail.

movies.title: Half White
movies.summary: In an alternate, xenophobic America, four immigrants must undergo white-face makeovers in order to secure employment at a software company.
movies.description_full: In an alternate, xenophobic America, four immigrants must undergo white-face makeovers in order to secure employment at a software company.
movies.synopsis: In an alternate, xenophobic America, four immigrants must undergo white-face makeovers in order to secure employment at a software company.

movies.title: Camp Nowhere
movies.summary: Morris "Mud" Himmel has a problem. His parents desperately want to send him away to summer camp. He hates going to summer camp, and would do anything to get out of it. Talking to his friends, he realises that they are all facing the same sentence: a boring summer camp. Together with his friends, he hatches a plan to trick all the parents into sending them to a camp of his own design, which would actually be a parent-free paradise. Blackmailing former drama teacher Dennis Van Welker into helping, they must convince the parents that the camp is genuine, and that they aren't allowed to visit...

movies.title: Every Home Should Have One
movies.summary: Teddy works for a large advertising company. Given the seemingly impossible task of selling frozen porridge, he decides to produce commercials which make the product seem sexy. This leads him into confrontation with the "Keep Television Clean" movement, of which his wife is a senior member. Further problems ensue when the family take on Swedish nanny Inga Giltenburg.
